Zealous Strike.name: Zealous Strike
Zealous Strike.flavor: With a roar, you charge at your enemies to deliver an overwhelming attack.
Zealous Strike.attack: Strength vs. AC. If the target is bloodied, you gain a +2 bonus to the attack roll.
Zealous Strike.onHit: 1[W] + Strength modifier damage, and you knock the target prone.
Zealous Strike.effect: Make the attack one more time against the same target or a different one.

Impetuous Stride.name: Impetuous Stride
Impetuous Stride.flavor: Primal energy surrounds you as you push through the enemiesâ€™ ranks. Only a fool would dare strike you.
Impetuous Stride.effect: You move your speed. If any creature makes an opportunity attack against you during this movement, that creature takes damage equal to 5 + your Wisdom modifier.

Form of the Leaping Stag.name: Form of the Leaping Stag
Form of the Leaping Stag.flavor: Great horns sprout from your head as primal power quickens your step. Your charging assault can leave an enemy senseless.
Form of the Leaping Stag.effect: Before the attack, you move your speed.
Form of the Leaping Stag.special: Once during this encounter, you can use the Form of the Leaping Stag Attack power while you are in this form.
Form of the Leaping Stag.requirement: The Form of the Leaping Stag power must be active to use this power.
Form of the Leaping Stag.onHit: 2[W] + Strength modifier damage, and the target is stunned until the end of your next turn.
Form of the Leaping Stag.onMiss: Half damage, and the target is dazed until the end of your next turn.
